org.w3c.dom.range.Range

Packages that use Range
org.w3c.dom.range DOM level 2 range interfaces. 
 

Uses of Range in org.w3c.dom.range
 

Methods in org.w3c.dom.range that return Range
 Range DocumentRange.createRange()
          This interface can be obtained from the object implementing the Document interface using binding-specific casting methods.
 Range Range.cloneRange()
          Produces a new range whose boundary-points are equal to the boundary-points of the range.
 

Methods in org.w3c.dom.range with parameters of type Range
 short Range.compareBoundaryPoints(short how, Range sourceRange)
          Compare the boundary-points of two ranges in a document.
